name: Gingerbread Man Christmas Decoration Hanger
description:
This is a listing for ONE Gingerbread man.

Each one is designed and handmade by me. 

Beige felt is used for the body, tiny buttons for his tummy. (Button colour & style may vary) Brads for his eyes and white Ric Rac ribbon for detailing on the arms and legs. Thin red grosgain ribbon has been used for the hanger.

Lightly stuffed with Fibrefil and sewn together using DMC embroidery threads.

Each little chap measures:

Width - 8cm 
Height (not including ribbon) - 10cm

Each order is made after payment so please allow a couple of days before I post. I will email you when he is ready for the off!


Thank you for looking!

name: Liberty Print Wooden Bird Brooch
description:
This is a listing for a lovely handmade bird brooch.

I have decoupaged a liberty print cotton fabric onto the wooden bird and sealed.

I have then added a pin on the back.

This is a small brooch but very cute.

Dimensions:

4cm x 1.5cm

I have other variations in my shop. Please take a look.

Thank you for taking the time to browse.

name: Wooden Heart Hanger Vintage Style Fabric Home Decor
description:
This is a listing for a handmade heart hanger.

I have decoupaged a lovely cotton vintage style fabric in pink/pale orange/brown & white onto a wooden base and then sealed. I have added some lovely cream lace. On top of that 3 co-ordinating buttons have been added with a twine tie in their centre. . Twine has been used to give the heart it's hanger.

Dimensions:

10cm x 10cm (not including the twine hanger)

I have other variations in my shop. Please take a look.

Thank you for taking the time to browse.

name: Halloween Felt Fabric Glow in the Dark Bat
description:
This is a listing for a Handmade bat Hanger designed by myself. Ideal for Halloween although is cute enough to stay up throughout the year.

Made from Red felt and Glow in the dark cotton fabric. A small orange button is attached for his nose. I have then used Black velvet ribbon for the hanger. Some Ric-rac ribbon has been used to create his legs. Fibrefil has been used to lightly stuff the bat.

Dimensions:

20cm x 12cm

A mixture of hand and machine sewing. 

I have other variations in my shop. Please take a look.

Thank you for taking the time to browse.

name: Felt Fabric Krafty Woodland Fox Ornament Animal
description:
This little fella is looking for a new home.

He has been handmade by me from my own design.

Using 70% Synthetic 30% Wool Felt in a gorgeous 'foxy' colour. Safety Eye's and a coordinating fabric. Sewn together using DMC thread. Stuffed with Fibrefil.

Measurements:

Height - 15cm

Width - 13cm

Perfect for just hanging around your shelves or units!

Not designed with children in mind.

I can make Foxy with a variety of Fabrics. Just ask!
